title: 3 and Out - Chiefs Big 3 Roll, Urban NFL Post-Mortem, NFL COVID Audible, Coach Prime Recruiting Coup, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Chiefs Big 3 Roll, Urban NFL Post-Mortem, NFL COVID Audible, Coach Prime Recruiting Coup, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Chiefs Mahomes/Kelce/Hill Big 3 rolling past the Chargers on Thursday night, and explains why KC is back on top as the Super Bowl favorite. He also gives his take on Urban Meyer getting canned in Jacksonville, the main reason he failed so spectacularly, why the NFL needs to relax the COVID rules now, and if Deion Sanders will end up taking his top recruits at Jackson State to a power 5 school as a packaged deal, He also answers listener questions in Middlekauff Mailbag. Make sure you follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
